&6&lEnd of Guide: Tips for remaining goals

&e&lSponge & Clownfish Collector
&rFish in the park during rain/thunder to get 64 raw
fish for a minion

&e&lPet Hoarder & Diversity
&rRefer to goal overlays in /bh (you can set a
keybind in minecraft settings to quickly hide/show
the overlays)

&e&lObsidian Collector
&rMine end nodes (save ench end stone for
endermite pet)

&e&lBrewer
&rPickobulus gold blocks in dwarven mines and brew
absorption potions (1 enchanted gold block)

&e&lStrange Eggs
&rLobby hop with bingo brewers mod or
/requestlobby in bingo brewers server to find
goblin eggs. Use eggs during 10x goblin chance
from skymall

&6&l! Disable guide in /bh to hide this message
